channel.title: Kameswar Rao Vaddina
channel.description: Welcome to Dr. Kameswar Rao Vaddina's homepage.

item.title: Welcome to homepage!
item.description:
Hi there, I am Kameswar Rao Vaddina, in short people call me Kamesh (ka-may- sh). I am a currently working as a postdoc researcher at the Department of Computer and Information Science (idi), Norwegian University of Science and Tecnology (NTNU).

My research interests are as follows:

1) Thermal modeling and analysis of chips

2) 3D stacked chips

3) Energy efficiency of heterogenous systems.
